Package progetto.network.socket

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INetworkCommand<T extends AbstractSocket>
    This class is the class that must be extended to allow the client and server to exchange informations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSocket
    Implements the standard form in which the socket are allowed to exchange info.
    ClientSocketFactory  
    EnforceCommand
    allows to transport a enforce across the network
    GoodByeCommand
    Informs the other side socket that the connections is closing
    INetworkClientSocketTest  
    KeepAliveCommand
    Message sent every TIME_TO_LIVE to inform the other side that we are still connected.
    MessageCommand
    Command sent to send a message.
    RequestCommand
    allow to send a request from client to the server
    SocketClient
    A socket client is a implementation of INetwork client, it is used on the client side to communicate with the server
    SocketClientTest  
    SocketHandler
    This class implements the INetworkHandler for the socket implementation
    SocketMessageExcangeTest  
    SocketNetworkTest  
    SocketServer
    A socket server is a class that accept connections and redirect them on a new socket
    SocketServerFactory  
    SocketServerTest  
    SocketSyncronizationTest
